name: Rakish Fighting
entries: You learned to fight on the streets and use everything you can to your advantage. As a bonus action you can attempt a dirty trick. One creature within 10 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Str or Dex, or become {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn. In addition, whenever you hit a creature you have advantage on you deal {@dice 1d6} extra damage.
